title: The Wonderful gift of the crane
creator_credit: Kazuhiko Watanabe, Masaji Hara, Gakken Company and Nippon Kangyo Bank
brief_description: A traditional Japanese story told with animated puppets. An elderly peasant cottage weaver frees a crane from a trap and his kindness is rewarded unexpectedly by magical gifts. The tale unfolds against a backdrop of colourful snow.
